Actions.Name: Monster Slayer
Actions.Description:
The next attack from the monster hunter gains +1 boon and deals bonus damage for each of the following conditions: 
• The monster hunter is standing in difficult or dangerous terrain. 
• The monster hunter is more than 3 spaces from a foe. 
• The monster hunter is on higher elevation from their target. 
• Their target is inflicted with lowlander toxin.
